item.prospectorspicks.pick.tooltip_1: Break 3 blocks to "sample" the area for ores.
item.prospectorspicks.pick.tooltip_2: Blocks must be located from 3 to 7 blocks apart from each other.
item.prospectorspicks.pick.error_far: Sample too far away from initial reading. Sampling around this point now, need 2 more samples.
item.prospectorspicks.pick.error_close: Sample too close to initial reading. Sampling around this point now, need 2 more samples.
